We have recently added "rule" support to LaunchConfigurationWorkingCopy.doSave
() (bug 46811) but this was included in the I20031202 build and the nightly 
build with no testing problems.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 47525 ***

Darin, to answer your comment #2, this is a transient problem so it's not
surprising that the tests passed a few times and then failed later.  We have a
good handle on the problem and plan to have a fix released early next week...
